site_name: Stuart House, 84 Cadogan Square, LONDON, SW1X 0DZ
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - h) notwithstanding the approved drawings, elevation (1:10) drawings of wall grilles) of Listed Building consent LB/23/04620 (Refurbishment of existing town house comprising of internal alterations and external alterations including: revisions to plan form; replacement of modern decorative features, internal alterations to main hallway staircase; reinstatement of rooflights in entertainment lounge; reinstatement of lightwell staircase; and changes to west elevation including new roof terrace door and brick attic staircase enclosure)
